title: The Roar of the Falls: My Journey with Kaya
description: What if you suddenly found yourself in Kaya's Nez Perce homeland in 1764? What would it be like to live in her village, to sleep in a tepee, and to follow the ways of her tribe? Join Kaya on exciting adventures and discover what it's like to care for a sick baby and ride horses bareback--but watch out for bears! Your journey back in time can take whatever twists and turns you choose as you select from a variety of exciting options in this all-new multiple-ending story.
author: Emma Carlson Berne
